titleStmt.title: An answer to a book published by Dr. Bramhall, late bishop of Derry; called the Catching of the leviathan. Together with an historical narration concerning heresie, and the punishment thereof. By Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury
titleStmt.author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Crooke at the Green Dragon without Temple-Barr,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Bramshall, John. The catching of the Leviathan, or the great whale.
"An historical narration concerning heresie, and the punishment thereof" has separate dated title page. Pagination and register are continuous.
Also isused as part of "Tracts of Mr. Thomas Hobbs of Malmsbury" (Wing (2nd ed.) H2265), 1682.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
